Name: Average time from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Total time spent in 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' before moving to any other activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Queued + Awaiting Assignment and the end of the case

Name: Average resolution time of incidents starting with 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Minimum time from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Completed + Closed' compared to 'Accepted + In Progress' to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Total time incidents spend in 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' compared to 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Minimum time it takes from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Average time incidents are in 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' before moving to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'

Name: Average time between 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and the next occurrence of 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Cycle time of incidents that pass through 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' more than once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Average time from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation' compared to 'Accepted + In Progress' to 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'

Name: Total time for incidents to move from 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' to 'Completed + Cancelled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Completed + Cancelled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of incidents starting with 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and involving 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Completed + In Call'
